name: stock_v2_get_risk_rating_breakdown
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool ms_finance.
Tool description: This API helps to query financial summary, stocks, quotes, movers, news, etc... to create a site/application such as morningstar.com
API description: Fetch the risk rating breakdown for a given stock performance ID.

performanceid.description: Value of performanceId field from …/auto-complete or /get-summary or …/get-movers endpoints
